nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_389_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The government has called for an immediate investigation of the activities of the police.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_390_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: We applied the medicine and in a few minutes Mrs. Johnson came to.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_391_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: She coldly said goodbye to her friends. With that she shut the door and cried in the room.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_392_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Whatever your reason, I shall hold to my idea that people should be allowed to have private lives.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_393_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: To our surprise the stranger turned out to be an old friend of my mother's.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_394_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He's not in the office; he's now on his way to London for a meeting.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_395_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: When setting out on a long walk, always wear suitable shoes.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_396_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: He was too disappointed by this lack of success to try again.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_397_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The couple loves each other dearly, but now and again they quarrel.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_398_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: In the subway station the poor old woman begged the passengers for money, but they paid no attention to her.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_934_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Hearing her answer, he was at a loss for what to say for a while.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_935_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: As he marks down the prices, he stops now and then to pack things into a large bag.
